FuncDef:
The collect counter command allows the flexible flow statistics exported to the NetStream Collector (NSC) to contain the number of bytes and packets.
The undo collect counter command restores the default setting. The collect counter command allows the flexible flow statistics exported to the NetStream Collector (NSC) to contain the number of bytes and packets. The undo collect counter command restores the default setting. By default, the flexible flow statistics exported to the NSC do not contain the number of bytes or packets.
ParentView: IPv4 flexible flow statistics template view,IPv6 flexible flow statistics template view,VXLAN flexible flow statistics template view

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates that the flexible flow statistics exported to NSC contain the number of bytes.
-

Indicates that the flexible flow statistics exported to NSC contain the number of packets.
-

ExtraInfo: To obtain richer flow statistics, configure whether flexible flow statistics contain the number of bytes and packets.
